ui_tut_m01_t06_archetype

What is your playstyle?Soldier likes nothing more than to have a weapon in his hand and wear a strong suit of armour; he is also infamous for his short temper.Adviser prefers to solve things using his knowledge, sharp tongue and a kind word.Scout likes to hide in the shadows and solve tasks silently, undetected and by stealth.Choosing a playstyle will give you some starting experience points, but the choice of what traits you will develop next is up to you.
要选择哪种初始的游玩风格呢？战士手持利器，身披坚铠。兵器是中世纪战士们最忠实的伙伴。要说性格？脾气火爆可是战士们的代名词！谋士饱读经书，更倾向于依靠他们的能言善道来解决问题。刺客总是隐藏在阴影之中，利用潜行技巧，悄无声息地完成任务。当选择一种游玩风格后，你将得到对应风格的初始经验值，在此之后，如何游玩、着重培养什么能力全由你自己决定。
